name: img-palette
description: A port of the Android Palette class to javascript

scripts.dist: webpack --output-library ImgPalette --output-library-target var dist/img-palette.global.js && webpack --output-library ImgPalette --output-library-target amd dist/img-palette.amd.js && babel --modules common lib/index.js > dist/img-palette.js

author: Chris Trotman <chris@trotman.io> (https://github.com/solarnz/)
